Bioshock Infinite Ã© um jogo incrÃ­vel que nÃ£o decepciona em nada, o jogo possui uma das melhores e mais complexas histÃ³rias dos games, o jogo alÃ©m de uma boa narrativa possui uma gameplay muito boa jÃ¡ que vocÃª pode usar tudo que o cenÃ¡rio lhe proporcina e alÃ©m disso vocÃª possui a ajuda da Elizabeth com seus poderes de abrir fendas, e vocÃª tem tambÃ©m a opÃ§Ã£o de usar as habilidades especiais que servem para diversas coisas durante o modo histÃ³ria mas que tambÃ©m sÃ£o muito uteis durante o combate. Bioshock Infinite faz parte de uma trilogia excelente e recomendo que vocÃª jogue todos os jogos, pois, o infinte finaliza a histÃ³ria da trilogia de forma triunfal explicando como funciona o universo do jogo e seus acontecimentos, o jogo Ã© mais do que recomendado para sua biblioteca Steam.

Uno de los mejores juegos que toque jamas, la realidad es que Irrational Games la tenia muy clara.
Un gameplay tremendo con mecÃ¡nicas parecidas a las anteriores entregas pero con grandes y oxigenados cambios que ayudan muchÃ­simo a la jugabilidad en general, haciendolo muy divertido y disfrutable ademas de contar con una historia a medida. Si jugaste uno o los dos tÃ­tulos previos a este, estas prÃ¡cticamente obligado a terminar este juegon. 

Pero el punto que te tiene que dar el empujÃ³n, son los precios de la trilogÃ­a, ya que en general suele estar muchas veces en oferta y si no pudiste probar estos juegos como me paso a mi, lo podes encontrar regularmente en 100 pesos, asÃ­ que no la alargues tanto y ponete a disfrutar de Rapture y Columbia.

igual que con las entregas anteriores una ambientaciÃ³n increÃ­ble, una buena e inteligente historia, personalmente los finales tanto de la campaÃ±a principal como el de los DLCs me parecen estupendos, y tambiÃ©n le da puntos tener a una belleza como Elizabeth. Recomendado.
QUE BUEN JUEGO LA REPUTISIMA MADRE

Bioshock Infinite may be my favorite game of all time with its enthralling plot, beautiful graphics, and impeccable atmosphere. The gameplay is once again a highlight in the series but the best part, as usual for a bioshock game, is the story and setting. It's so fun to explore the world and equally as amazing to watch this great story unfold.
Didn't have any expectation but this game blew my mind. Wonderful. If you haven't played this, please do.

Never thought this game would be so good.

After seeing what they did with the 2nd game, I thought this would be as mediocre, but I was wrong... I feel like this was one of my favourite stories told by a game. The rollercoaster that it takes you on, story is beautiful, the world building is great, the dlc in rapture was quite something,
Love Bioshock, love this game, DLC is epic too. Just play all of them.
Gameplay was very fun and unique. The storyline was amazing. 10/10 would play again.
Bioshock and it's endings , absolutely mindblowing :)

tiene buena jugabilidad y una historia que te deja como wtf pero de buena forma
Not a successor to the first Bioshock. Not enjoying inching through the gameplay so far.

Bioshock Infinite is one of gaming's best masterpieces from the early 2010s. Playing as Booker DeWitt, go to a floating city in the clouds and extract a girl to the world below. Bioshock Infinite excels in almost everything it does. With its stunning visuals, character designs (that are reminiscent of Dishonored), and environments, Bioshock Infinite is simply a marvel to look at and adds to the enjoyment of seeing what comes next in this adventure. The gameplay is fantastic. Combat is satisfying to the senses with its variety of weapons and special powers to spice up your combat encounters. Infinite really draws you in with its story. First it draws you with the majesty of the city itself, exposes its true American fascist core, then expertly establishes a connection with Elizabeth that is the hallmark of the game itself. By its end, you will want more stories surrounding the setting and characters themselves.

It's a great game but could have been much more. If you take it as it is and not what it could have been you'll have a good time.
Side note: I'm not too keen on the message the game says about the conflict between two certain groups in the middle of the game, but it's not enough to make me dislike the game as a whole.
Great game with likeable characters, good story, and good atmosphere.
Just play the other ones they're way better.
This shit slaps, specially near the halfway mark.
Remember all those times that you should've bought this but didn't? That is why you're a failure.

La verdad que es un juego demasiado bueno te da la capacidad de explorar y eso es mucho para un juego un poco lineal tambien no se siente aburrido cada vez que terminas un capitulo te quedas con ganas de mas (de hecho las 9 hs que tengo son de jugarlo de corrido) Un gameplay dinamico mas la movilidad que hay gracias al gancho y que decir del final que es una rompida de ojete ya que hacen que todo quede tan bien la verdad que es un juego recomendado
